# Python dependencies for HAFiscal
# This file is for pip-based installation (alternative to conda)

# Core scientific computing
numpy==1.26.4
scipy==1.11.4
pandas==2.1.4

# Visualization
matplotlib==3.8.0

# Jupyter ecosystem
jupyter
jupyterlab
ipywidgets
voila

# Optimization and performance
numba==0.59.0

# Economics toolkit
econ-ark==0.14.1

# Additional packages
sequence-jacobian
runipy
jupyter_contrib_nbextensions

# Testing
pytest
pytest-cov
